w :  what was it like growing up in new york ' s bronx district ?  was it safe ?
m :  to me it was  it was all i knew .  my mom would send me to the shop and i ' d go and buy things when i was about 8 years old .

question: what do we learn from the conversation ?
choice: the woman did not feel any danger growing up in the bronx .
the man thinks it was quite safe living in the bronx district .
the woman started working at an early age to support her family .
answer: the woman did not feel any danger growing up in the bronx .
